Keywords: Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Special Powers
STARTING PLOT POINTS: 0
CONTINUITY: When Reed Richards, Fixer of Universes is KO'd, Generate a Molecule Man bystander in an opponent's starting area that's friendly to that force.
(+1) NO MORE SUPERHEROICS FOR A WHILE, JUST SCIENCE: FREE: Outwit, Perplex until your next turn. At the end of your turn, heal Reed Richards, Fixer Of Universes 1 click if he targeted 1+ opposing characters with Outwit or Perplex this turn.
(+0) UNCOVERING THE REAL SOURCE OF DOOM'S POWER: FREE: If Reed Richards, Fixer Of Universes occupies an opponent's starting area, generate a Molecule Man bystander [MAX 1].
(-1) CONVINCING OWEN TO UNWRITE VICTOR'S TWISTED REALITY: FREE: If Reed Richards, Fixer Of Universes is adjacent to Molecule Man, roll a d6. Deal that much unavoidable damage to the lowest point character on an opponent's force (you choose if there's a tie).

Comments
May 7, 2021
Goop
I dont think most people understand how difficult is it getting to your opponents starting area, and then not having their whole team turn around and nuke you. I just dont see him living that long after getting there. Its a nice concept piece but its a lot of work and very very difficult to play right. There are just better options out there.
December 26, 2020
DatHomieSilverSurfer
You know what, I take back all my complaints with this piece. He does everything Reed should do, with the fun addition of potentially dealing damage to your opponents best pieces/bringing in Owen. He has a long, tanky dial for the cost that has what essentially comes down to traited Outwit/Perplex and the ability to either recover from using his plot abilities or even healing for free if he makes an attack while using the perplex/outwit. 7 clix with toughness and high defense values (ending on a 20!!!) means he can take more hits than any other version of the character. He's good, my favorite reed outside of the Starter Set (and MAYBE the 60point rare who gives out leadership to everyone)
November 4, 2020
Disasstah
I know it's golden age but this guy would be pretty amazing with the white power battery.
August 19, 2020
Ilovemywiener
needs no support. ####in amazing
July 28, 2020
Just Some Coffee
I feel like he needs more than that. Give him that if he's in a starting area he cannot take damage from opponents outside of that starting area. Or that he ignores power cosmic, or that characters with "Doom" in their name can only damage Reed Richards with a close combat attack and cannot use powers to attack them. Or if Reed Richards is adjacent to Molecule Man, he can use the powers of the highest point character of your opponents team. There's a lot of ways that should have played, crossing the map to deal unavoidable damage to the lowest point character isn't even comics accurate. It's like no one knew what to do when he was being designed.
July 27, 2020
bam
He definitely needs a fast forces ghost rider to lend him exploit weakness
